generated_description: pentex equipaciones deportivas, legally known as pentex s.l., is a company based in solsona, catalonia, specializing in the production of customized sports equipment. established in 1980, the company has over 35 years of experience in the textile sector, reinventing itself to create its own brand. pentex has served more than 1500 clubs, providing tailored sports apparel. the company emphasizes innovation and national production, meeting the diverse needs of its clients from product design to sales.
